Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
  
 
To whom it may concern, 
 
  
 
This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your
client www.audioresolution.com <http://www.audioresolution.com/>   and our client
Sony Camcorder. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the
unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this
letter on 10/05/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been
rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to fully comply. Please provide me
with a follow-up on this by 11/17/2006. If you have any questions please do not
hesitate to contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com.  Below you will find
the Cease and Desist letter with the infringing URL's. 
 
  
 
ISP CEASE AND DESIST LETTER 
 
  
 
10/18/2006  
 
7155 5474 4100 4346 4372 
 
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL 
 
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
  
 
Everyones Internet 
 
Chris Newcomb 
 
390 Benmar Dr. Ste. 200, 
 
Houston, TX. 77060 
 
  
 
Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 
 
  
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
  
 
We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect
to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.   
 
  
 
Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify
you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, audioresolution.com, at the URL
www.audioresolution.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials
without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to
camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good
faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. 
 
  
 
The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to
be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted
images from Sony's website.  Specific violations of copyrighted images by
audioresolution.com are listed below this paragraph. 
 
  
 
http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4834/99232_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html

 
  
 
http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4853/99285_minidv_digital_camcorder.html

 
  
 
http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4844/99284_minidv_digital_camcorder_black.html

 
  
 
http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4856/99751_minidv_digital_camcorder.html

 
  
 
http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4929/99283_minidv_camcorder.html

 
  
 
There are various additional locations of infringement on www.audioresolution.com
website.  The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all
infringements need to be addressed. 
 
  
 
  
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby
demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communications should be in writing. 
Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. 
Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to
Net Enforcers.  If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this
demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 10/27/2006, we will assume that this demand has
been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
VCLM Law 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
  
 
  
 
Barbara Davis 
 
LMS Manager 
 
Net Enforcers Inc. 
 
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com  
 
  
 
The Online Enforcement Specialists...... 
 
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
